author: Staff Reporter
text:
Across Tamirabarani through video conference

An overbridge constructed across the Tamirabarani in Thikkurichi Kadavu near Marthandam was dedicated to the public by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa through video conference on Sunday.

The bridge was constructed by the Department of Highways and Small Ports at a cost of Rs.8-crore. The overbridge project was constructed with the funds provided by the National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development under the Rural Infrastructure Development Fund (RIDF) XVI Scheme.

Collector Sajjansingh R.Chavan who was present at the bridge distributed sweets to the public in the presence of the Kanyakumari MLA K.T. Pachaimal.

Assistant Divisional Engineer of Department of Highways T. Chitra, Kanyakumari District Milk Producers’ Cooperative Union Chairman S.A. Asokan, Unnamalaikadai Town Panchayat President R. Jayaseelan, and representatives of local bodies were also present.
title: Jayalalithaa dedicates overbridge to public
